text: Moda Domani Institute was a French higher studies establishment. The school was in Paris, France.Une école de commerce spécialisée dans la mode ouvre à Paris It started in 2014. Moda Domani Institute was specialist in the fields of luxury, fashion and design.Moda Domani Institute, Marc Drillech en interview exclusive The school closes in September 2020, replaced by ISG Luxury Management. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Category:Education in France
title: Moda Domani Institute
